field.label: Item type
field.hint: The type of the item you wish to submit.
field.required: You must select a type for the item you wish to submit.

field.label: Title
field.hint: The official title of the work, given in one or more languages.
field.required: You must enter at least one title for the item you wish to submit.

field.label: Alternative title / Subtitle
field.hint: The secondary title or subtitle of the work, if such exists, given in one or more languages.

field.label: Name(s) of creator(s)
field.hint: The names of the creators of the work submitted, given in one or more languages.
field.required: You must enter the name of at least one creator.

field.label: Subject classification
field.hint: The thematic category under which the subject of the work can be classified, e.g. Mathematics, Structural engineering etc.

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: A keyword describing the subject of the item.
field.required: You must enter at least one keyword.

field.label: Item identifiers
field.hint: One or more unique identifiers for the submission item (e.g. a DOI for a publication or an ISBN for a book).

field.label: Item language
field.hint: The language(s) of the item's contents. More than one can be selected in case of multilingual content.

field.label: Item access scheme
field.hint: The access scheme of the item's full text. Possible choices include: 1) leaving the item accessible to the public, 2) allowing access to users that use an IP address within the institutional IP range, 3) allowing access only to logged-in DSpace users, and 4) setting a 6 months embargo period, during which the full text of the item is not available. When the embargo period ends, the public access scheme is assigned to the item.
field.required: You must select an access scheme for the item you wish to submit.

field.label: Institution and School/Department of submitter
field.hint: The institution and school/department, in the collection of which the item belongs.
field.required: You must enter at least one pair of institution and school/department.

field.label: Name(s) of contributor(s)
field.hint: The names of contributors to this work (EXCEPT the thesis' advisor or committee members).

field.label: General description / Additional comments
field.hint: General description or additional comments for the item you wish to submit.

field.label: Thesis completion date
field.hint: The date printed on the thesis' front page.
field.required: You must enter at least the year the thesis was completed in.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: The abstract of the thesis.

field.label: Table of contents
field.hint: The thesis' table of contents.

field.label: Sponsor
field.hint: A statement regarding the thesis' sponsors, if any.

field.label: Advisor name
field.hint: The name of the thesis' advisor(-s).
field.required: You must enter the name of the advisor (or advisors)

field.label: Examining committee
field.hint: The names of the members of the thesis' examining committee.
field.required: You must enter the names of all examining committee members.

field.label: Publishing institution
field.hint: The institution the thesis was completed in. Please select the same institution as in the first page.
field.required: You must select an institution from the list.

field.label: Publishing department/division
field.hint: The school/department of the institution the thesis was carried out in. If the division and/or laboratory/research group in which the thesis was carried out are known, they are filled out in the form "School/Department"."Division"."Laboratory", e.g. School of Electrical & Computer Engineering. Division Of Computer Science. Knowledge & Database Systems Laboratory.
field.required: You must enter a value for the publishing department.

field.label: Number of Pages
field.hint: The thesis' number of pages.

field.label: Bibliographic citation
field.hint: The recommended citation format for the thesis. Usually, citations are provided in the form: "Author Name", "Thesis title", "School/Department","Institution","Year".

field.label: Name(s) of contributor(s)
field.hint: Names of contributors to this thesis, if such exist (EXCEPT the thesis' advisor or committee members).

field.label: Thesis completion date
field.hint: The date printed on the thesis' front page.
field.required: You must enter at least the year the thesis was completed in.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: The abstract of the thesis.

field.label: Table of contents
field.hint: The thesis' table of contents.

field.label: Sponsor
field.hint: A statement regarding the thesis' sponsors, if any.

field.label: Advisor name
field.hint: The name of the thesis' advisor.
field.required: You must enter the name of the advisor

field.label: Examining committee
field.hint: The names of the members of the thesis' examining committee.
field.required: You must enter the names of all examining committee members.

field.label: Thesis publishing institution
field.hint: The institution the thesis was completed in. Please select the same institution as in the first page.
field.required: You must select an institution.

field.label: Thesis publishing department/division
field.hint: The school/department of the institution the thesis was carried out in. If the division and/or laboratory/research group in which the thesis was carried out are known, they are filled out in the form "School/Department"."Division"."Laboratory", e.g. School of Electrical & Computer Engineering. Division Of Computer Science. Knowledge & Database Systems Laboratory.
field.required: You must enter a value for the publishing department.

field.label: Number of Pages
field.hint: The thesis' number of pages.

field.label: Bibliographic citation
field.hint: The recommended citation format for the thesis. Usually, citations are provided in the form: "Author Name", "Thesis title", "School/Department","Institution","Year".

field.label: Name(s) of contributor(s)
field.hint: Names of contributors to this thesis, if such exist (EXCEPT the thesis' advisor or committee members).

field.label: Thesis completion date
field.hint: The date printed on the thesis' front page.
field.required: You must enter at least the year the thesis was completed in.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: The abstract of the thesis.

field.label: Table of contents
field.hint: The thesis' table of contents.

field.label: Sponsor
field.hint: A statement regarding the thesis' sponsors, if any.

field.label: Advisor name
field.hint: The name of the thesis' advisor.
field.required: You must enter the name of the advisor

field.label: Examining committee
field.hint: The names of the members of the thesis' examining committee.
field.required: You must enter the names of all examining committee members.

field.label: Thesis publishing institution
field.hint: The institution the thesis was completed in. Please select the same institution as in the first page.
field.required: You must select an institution.

field.label: Thesis publishing department/division
field.hint: The school/department of the institution the thesis was carried out in. If the division and/or laboratory/research group in which the thesis was carried out are known, they are filled out in the form "School/Department"."Division"."Laboratory", e.g. School of Electrical & Computer Engineering. Division Of Computer Science. Knowledge & Database Systems Laboratory.
field.required: You must enter a value for the publishing department.

field.label: Number of Pages
field.hint: The thesis' number of pages.

field.label: Bibliographic citation
field.hint: The recommended citation format for the thesis. Usually, citations are provided in the form: "Author Name", "Thesis title", "School/Department","Institution","Year".

field.label: Name(s) of contributor(s)
field.hint: Names of contributors to this thesis, if such exist (EXCEPT the thesis' advisor or committee members).

field.label: Type of the conference item
field.hint: The type of the conference item you wish to submit
field.required: You must choose one of the available options.

field.label: Publication date
field.hint: The publication date of the proceedings of the conference. If the conference does not publish proceedings, then the conference date should be entered.
field.required: You must enter at least the year the item was published.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: The item's abstract, if such exists.

field.label: Table of contents
field.hint: The item's table of contents, if such exists.

field.label: Sponsor
field.hint: A statement regarding the item's sponsors, if any.

field.label: Conference name
field.required: You must enter the conference name.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: The publisher of the proceedings of the conference. If the item is not part of the conference proceedings, then leave blank.

field.label: Bibliographic citation
field.hint: The recommended citation format for the item. Usually, citations are provided in the form: "Author Name", "Publication title", "Conference Name","Publisher","Year".
field.required: You must fill in the bibliographic citation field.

field.label: Name(s) of contributor(s)
field.hint: The names of contributors to this work.

field.label: General description / Additional comments
field.hint: General description or additional comments for the item you wish to submit.

field.label: Publication date
field.hint: The article's publication date.
field.required: You must enter at least the year the article was published.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: The article's abstract.

field.label: Table of contents
field.hint: The article's table of contents.

field.label: Sponsor
field.hint: A statement regarding the article's sponsors, if any.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: The publisher of the journal the article was published in.
field.required: You must fill in the publisher of the article.

field.label: Journal name
field.required: You must fill in the journal name.

field.label: Journal type
field.hint: Classification of journals to those who follow a peer review process for their articles and those who don't.

field.label: Bibliographic citation
field.hint: The recommended citation format for the article. Usually, citations are provided in the form: "Author Name", "Article title", "Journal name","Volume (Issue)", "Page range", "Publisher","Year".
field.required: You must fill in the bibliographic citation field.

field.label: Name(s) of contributor(s)
field.hint: The names of contributors to the article.

field.label: General description / Additional comments
field.hint: General description or additional comments for the item you wish to submit.

field.label: Publication date
field.hint: The chapter's publication date.
field.required: You must enter at least the year the chapter was published.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: The chapter's abstract, if such exists.

field.label: Table of contents
field.hint: The chapter's table of contents, if such exists.

field.label: Sponsor
field.hint: A statement regarding the chapter's sponsors, if any.

field.label: Book name
field.hint: The name of the book, part of which is the chapter.
field.required: You must enter the book name.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: The book's publisher.
field.required: You must fill in the publisher of the book.

field.label: Bibliographic citation
field.hint: The recommended citation format for the chapter. Usually, citations are provided in the form: "Author Name", "Chapter title", "Book name","Page range", "Publisher","Year".
field.required: You must fill in the bibliographic citation field.

field.label: Name(s) of contributor(s)
field.hint: The names of contributors to the chapter.

field.label: General description / Additional comments
field.hint: General description or additional comments for the chapter you wish to submit.

field.label: Publication date
field.hint: The book's publication date.
field.required: You must enter at least the year the book was published.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: The book's abstract or synopsis.

field.label: Table of contents
field.hint: The book's table of contents.

field.label: Sponsor
field.hint: A statement regarding the book's sponsors, if any.

field.label: Book edition
field.hint: The book's edition, expressed as an integer number.

field.label: Number of pages
field.hint: The book's total number of pages.

field.label: Book series
field.hint: The series of which the book is part.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: The book's publisher.
field.required: You must enter the publisher.

field.label: Bibliographic citation
field.hint: The recommended citation format for the book. Usually, citations are provided in the form: "Author Name", "Book name", "Series","Publisher","Year".
field.required: You must fill in the bibliographic citation field.

field.label: Name(s) of contributor(s)
field.hint: The names of contributors to this book.

field.label: General description / Additional comments
field.hint: General description or additional comments for the book you wish to submit.

field.label: Educational material type
field.required: You must select a value for the type of the educational material.

field.label: Publishing institution
field.hint: The institution, in the courses of which the material is used.
field.required: You must select an institution from the list.

field.label: Publishing department/division
field.hint: The school/department of the institution for courses of which the material was prepared.

field.label: Date created
field.hint: The material's creation date.

field.label: Table of contents
field.hint: The item's table of contents, if such exists.

field.label: Course details
field.hint: Details for the course(s) supporting the described material. The value of this field includes the course name, the semester, as well as the course level (undergraduate or postgraduate), in the form "Course Name" ["Semester", "Course Level"],e.g. Differential Equations[3rd semester, undergraduate].

field.label: Name(s) of contributor(s)
field.hint: Names of contributors to this material.

field.label: General Description / Additional Comments
field.hint: General description or additional comments for the material you wish to submit.
